238:1: śīlavatāmihaivābhiprāyāḥ kalyāṇāḥ samṛdhyanti prāgeva paratreti śīlaviśuddhau prayatitavyam|
238:3: bodhisattvaḥ kila kasmiṃścinnātimahati kahlāra-tāmarasa-kamala-kuvalayavibhūṣitarucirasalile haṃsa-kāraṇḍava-cakravāka-mithunopaśobhite tīrāntaruhatarukusumāvakīrṇe sarasi matsyādhipatirbabhūva|
238:4: svabhyastabhāvācca bahuṣu janmāntareṣu parārthacaryāyāstatrastho'pi parahitasukhapratipādanavyāpāro babhūva|
238:5: abhyāsayogāddhi śubhāśubhāni karmāṇi sātmyena bhavanti puṃsām|
238:7: iṣṭānāmiva ca sveṣāmapatyānāmupari niviṣṭahārdo mahāsattvasteṣāṃ mīnānāṃ dānapriyavacanārthacaryādikramaiḥ paramanugrahaṃ cakāra|
238:9: yogādupāyajñatayā ca teṣāṃ vismārayāmāsa sa matsyavṛttam||2||
238:10: tattena samyakparipālyamānaṃ vṛddhiṃ parāṃ mīnakulaṃ jagāma|
238:12: atha kadācitsattvānāṃ bhāgyasampadvaikalyātpramādācca varṣādhikṛtānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ na samyagdevo vavarṣa|
238:13: athāsamyagvarṣiṇi deve tatsaraḥ phullakadambakusumagaureṇa navasalilena na yathāpuramāpupūre|
238:14: krameṇa copagate nidāghakālasamaye paṭutaradīptibhiḥ khedālasagatibhiriva ca dinakarakiraṇaistadabhitaptayā ca dharaṇyā jvālānugateneva ca hlādābhi lāṣiṇā mārutena tarṣavaśādiva pratyahamāpīyamānaṃ tatsaraḥ palvalībabhūva|
238:17: atha bodhisattvo vāyasagaṇairapi paritarkyamāṇaṃ prāgeva salilatīrāntacāribhiḥ pakṣigaṇairviṣādadainyavaśagaṃ vispanditamātraparāyaṇaṃ mīnakulamavekṣya karuṇāyamānaścintāmāpede|
238:25: tatkimatra prāptakālaṃ syāditi vimṛśansa mahātmā satyādhiṣṭhānamekamārtāyanaṃ dadarśa|
238:26: karuṇayā ca samāpīḍyamānahṛdayo dīrghamuṣṇamabhiniśvasya nabhaḥ samullokayannavāca-
238:27: smarāmi na prāṇivadhaṃ yathāhaṃ sañcintya kṛcchre parame'pi kartum|
238:29: atha tasya mahātmanaḥ puṇyopacayaguṇātsatyādhiṣṭhānabalāttadabhiprasāditadevanāgayakṣānubhāvācca samantatastoyābalambibimbā gambhīramadhuranirghoṣā vidyullatālaṅkṛtanīlavipulaśikharā vijṛmbhamāṇā iva pravisarpibhiḥ śikharabhujaiḥ pariṣvajamānā iva cānyonyamakālameghāḥ kālameghāḥ prādurabhavan|
238:30: diśāṃ pramiṇvanta iva prayāmaṃ śṛṅgairvitanvanta ivāndhakāram|
238:32: saṃsaktakekaiḥ śikhibhiḥ prahṛṣṭaiḥ saṃstūyamānā iva nṛttacitraiḥ|
238:34: muktā vimuktā iva tairvimuktā dhārā nipetuḥ praśaśāma reṇuḥ|
238:40: atha bodhisattvaḥ samantato'bhiprasṛtairāpāṇḍubhiḥ salilapravāhairāpūryamāṇe sarasi dhārānipātasamakālameva vidrute vāyasādye pakṣigaṇe pratilabdhajīvitāśe ca pramudite mīnagaṇe prītyābhisāryamāṇahṛdayo varṣanivṛttisāśaṅkaḥ punaḥ punaḥ parjanyamābabhāṣe-
238:45: āvarjitā yatkalaśā iveme kṣaranti ramyastanitāḥ payodāḥ||15||
238:46: mahatpramādaskhalitaṃ tvidaṃ me yannāma kṛtyeṣu bhavadvidhānām|
238:48: cintāṃ kṛthā mā tadataḥ paraṃ tvaṃ satāṃ hi kṛtyodvahane'smi dhuryaḥ|
238:52: tadevaṃ śīlavatāmihaivābhiprāyāḥ kalyāṇāḥ samṛdhyanti prāgeva paratreti śīlaviśuddhau prayatitavyam|
